Container.Name: Durn's GoDaddy Dynamic DNS
Container.Description: Durn's GoDaddy Dynamic DNS is meant to update GoDaddy Domain DNS records using a valid API Key Pair. It works by checking WAN IP against the DNS records, and issuing an update if records differ.[br] Big thanks to lmammino for making the godaddy-dns package run in this container, please support his amazing work.[br][br]
